results.name: Characteristic function of magic numbers A018226: 1 if n is a magic number else 0.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
program: (PARI) A162518(n) = if(n<1, 0, polcoeff( x^126+x^82+x^50+x^28+x^20+x^8+x^2, n)); \\ _Antti Karttunen_, Dec 24 2018, after code in A089011
results.author: _Omar E. Pol_, Jul 07 2009
ext: Data section extended up to a(126) by _Antti Karttunen_, Dec 24 2018
